attributes.additional_details:
The A420 between Oxford to Swindon is a nightmare! It is a cut through for all lorries to get to the M4. There has been a significant number of deaths and injuries along this road.(Between 99-2010 15 deaths, 16 injuries, BBC Accident Map and further details are on www.crashmap.co.uk) Because of the increased volume and now GPS speed limited lorries people are taking more risks when over taking. There are more and more vehicles using this route, it needs to be dual carriagway, the ENTIRE length. Our roads quite simply need more capacity.
There is obviously a green issue that will be raised, but as oil vanishes, the green car will appear and we will still need the capacity.

rejection.details: This is a matter for the local authorities responsible for the road.
